name: setConfirmedSettings
description: Sets a JavaScript object, as settings to the ui5-view-settings-dialog. This method can be used after the dialog is initially open, as the dialog need to set its initial settings. The ui5-view-settings-dialog throws an event called "before-open", this can be used as trigger point. The object should have the following format: {sortOrder: "Ascending", sortBy: "Name", filters: [{"Filter 1": ["Some filter 1", "Some filter 2"]}, {"Filter 2": ["Some filter 4"]}]}
